query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
10 Ella giunse e levò ambo le palme, 11 ficcando li occhi verso l’orïente, 12 come dicesse a Dio: ‘D’altro non calme’.
query.result:
**English:**
10 She arrived and raised both her palms, 11 fixing her eyes towards the east, 12 as if to say to God: ‘I care for nothing else’.
**Malay:**
10 Dia tiba dan mengangkat kedua telapak tangannya, 11 mengarahkan matanya ke arah timur, 12 seolah berkata kepada Tuhan: ‘Aku tidak peduli dengan yang lain’.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
19 Aguzza qui, lettor, ben li occhi al vero, 20 ché ’l velo è ora ben tanto sottile, 21 certo che ’l trapassar dentro è leggero.
query.result:
**English:**
19 Sharpen here, reader, your eyes to the truth, 20 for the veil is now so thin, 21 that surely to pass through it is easy.
**Malay:**
19 Pertajam di sini, pembaca, matamu pada kebenaran, 20 karena tirai sekarang sangat tipis, 21 tentu saja melewatinya itu mudah.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
28 Verdi come fogliette pur mo nate 29 erano in veste, che da verdi penne 30 percosse traean dietro e ventilate.
query.result:
**English:**
28 Green like newly born leaves 29 were their garments, which from green wings 30 beaten and blown behind them.
**Malay:**
28 Hijau seperti daun-daun yang baru tumbuh 29 adalah pakaian mereka, yang dari sayap-sayap hijau 30 yang dipukul dan ditiup di belakang mereka.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
31 L’un poco sovra noi a star si venne, 32 e l’altro scese in l’opposita sponda, 33 sì che la gente in mezzo si contenne.
query.result:
**English:**
31 A little above us, one came to a halt, 32 and the other descended to the opposite bank, 33 so that the people in the middle contained themselves.
**Malay:**
31 Sedikit di atas kami, seorang datang dan berhenti, 32 dan yang lain turun ke tepi seberang, 33 sehingga orang-orang di tengah menahan diri.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
34 Ben discernëa in lor la testa bionda; 35 ma ne la faccia l’occhio si smarria, 36 come virtù ch’a troppo si confonda.
query.result:
**English:**
34 I clearly discerned her blond head there; 35 but in her face my sight was lost, 36 like a virtue that is too dazzling.
**Malay:**
34 Dengan jelas kulihat kepala pirangnya di sana; 35 tetapi di wajahnya pandanganku hilang, 36 seperti kebajikan yang terlalu menyilaukan.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
37 «Ambo vegnon del grembo di Maria», 38 disse Sordello, «a guardia de la valle, 39 per lo serpente che verrà vie via».
query.result:
**English:**
37 "Both of us come from the womb of Mary," 38 said Sordello, "to guard the valley, 39 because of the serpent that will come this way."
**Malay:**
37 "Kami berdua datang dari rahim Maria," 38 kata Sordello, "untuk menjaga lembah ini, 39 karena ular yang akan datang ke sini."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
40 Ond’ io, che non sapeva per qual calle, 41 mi volsi intorno, e stretto m’accostai, 42 tutto gelato, a le fidate spalle.
query.result:
**English:**
40 Whereupon I, who knew not which way to go, 41 turned around and, trembling, 42 pressed close to my faithful shoulders.
**Malay:**
40 Di mana aku, yang tidak tahu jalan mana yang harus ditempuh, 41 berbalik dan, gemetar, 42 menempel erat pada bahuku yang setia.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
43 E Sordello anco: «Or avvalliamo omai 44 tra le grandi ombre, e parleremo ad esse; 45 grazïoso fia lor vedervi assai».
query.result:
**English:**
43 And Sordello again: "Now let us proceed 44 among the great shades, and we will speak to them; 45 it will be gracious for them to see you."
**Malay:**
43 Dan Sordello berkata lagi: "Sekarang mari kita melangkah 44 di antara bayangan-bayangan besar, dan kita akan berbicara kepada mereka; 45 akan menyenangkan bagi mereka untuk melihatmu."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
46 Solo tre passi credo ch’i’ scendesse, 47 e fui di sotto, e vidi un che mirava 48 pur me, come conoscer mi volesse.
query.result:
**English:**
46 I believe I descended only three steps, 47 and I was below, and I saw someone who was looking 48 only at me, as if he wanted to recognize me.
**Malay:**
46 Aku yakin aku hanya menuruni tiga langkah, 47 dan aku berada di bawah, dan aku melihat seseorang yang sedang melihat 48 hanya padaku, seolah-olah dia ingin mengenali aku.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
49 Temp’ era già che l’aere s’annerava, 50 ma non sì che tra li occhi suoi e ’ miei 51 non dichiarisse ciò che pria serrava.
query.result:
**English:**
49 It was already the hour when the air grows dark, 50 but not so that between her eyes and mine 51 it did not reveal what it had been hiding before.
**Malay:**
49 Saat itu sudah tiba ketika udara mulai gelap, 50 tetapi tidak sedemikian rupa sehingga di antara matanya dan mataku 51 tidak menyingkapkan apa yang sebelumnya disembunyikannya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
52 Ver’ me si fece, e io ver’ lui mi fei: 53 giudice Nin gentil, quanto mi piacque 54 quando ti vidi non esser tra ’ rei!
55 Nullo bel salutar tra noi si tacque; 56 poi dimandò: «Quant’ è che tu venisti 57 a piè del monte per le lontane acque?».
query.result:
**English:**
52 He turned to me, and I to him: 53 Gentle judge Ninus, how much it pleased me 54 when I saw you were not among the wicked!
55 No beautiful greeting was silent between us; 56 then he asked: "How long is it since you came 57 to the foot of the mountain by the distant waters?".
**Malay:**
52 Dia berpaling kepadaku, dan aku kepadanya: 53 Hakim Ninus yang lembut, betapa senangnya aku 54 ketika aku melihatmu tidak berada di antara orang-orang jahat!
55 Tidak ada salam yang indah yang terdiam di antara kami; 56 kemudian dia bertanya: "Sudah berapa lama sejak kamu datang 57 ke kaki gunung melalui air yang jauh?".

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
58 «Oh!», diss’ io lui, «per entro i luoghi tristi 59 venni stamane, e sono in prima vita, 60 ancor che l’altra, sì andando, acquisti».
query.result:
**English:**
58 "Oh!" I said to him, "through the sad places 59 I came this morning, and I am in the early part of my life, 60 although the other, thus going, I acquire."
**Malay:**
58 "Oh!" kataku kepadanya, "melalui tempat-tempat yang menyedihkan 59 aku datang pagi ini, dan aku berada di awal hidupku, 60 meskipun yang lain, dengan berjalan seperti ini, kudapatkan."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
61 E come fu la mia risposta udita, 62 Sordello ed elli in dietro si raccolse 63 come gente di sùbito smarrita.
query.result:
**English:**
61 And when my answer was heard, 62 Sordello and he drew back 63 like people suddenly bewildered.
**Malay:**
61 Dan ketika jawabanku didengar, 62 Sordello dan dia mundur 63 seperti orang-orang yang tiba-tiba bingung.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
64 L’uno a Virgilio e l’altro a un si volse 65 che sedea lì, gridando: «Sù, Currado! 66 vieni a veder che Dio per grazia volse».
query.result:
**English:**
64 One turned to Virgil and the other to one 65 who was sitting there, crying out: "Up, Currado! 66 come and see what God in his grace has willed."
**Malay:**
64 Yang satu berpaling kepada Virgil dan yang lain kepada seseorang 65 yang duduk di sana, berseru: "Bangun, Currado! 66 datang dan lihatlah apa yang Tuhan kehendaki dengan rahmat-Nya."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
67 Poi, vòlto a me: «Per quel singular grado 68 che tu dei a colui che sì nasconde 69 lo suo primo perché, che non lì è guado,
70 quando sarai di là da le larghe onde, 71 dì a Giovanna mia che per me chiami 72 là dove a li ’nnocenti si risponde.
query.result:
**English:**
67 Then, turning to me: "Because of that unique favor 68 that you owe to the one who so conceals himself 69 his first why, for which there is no ford there,
70 when you will be beyond the broad waves, 71 tell my Giovanna to call upon me 72 there where the innocent are answered.
**Malay:**
67 Kemudian, berpaling kepadaku: "Karena kebaikan hati yang unik itu 68 yang harus kamu berikan kepada dia yang begitu menyembunyikan dirinya 69 alasan pertamanya, yang tidak ada jalan di sana,
70 ketika kamu akan berada di seberang ombak yang luas, 71 katakan kepada Giovanna-ku agar memanggilku 72 di sana tempat orang-orang yang tidak bersalah dijawab.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
73 Non credo che la sua madre più m’ami, 74 poscia che trasmutò le bianche bende, 75 le quai convien che, misera!, ancor brami.
query.result:
**English:**
73 I do not believe that his mother loves me any more, 74 since she changed the white swaddling clothes, 75 which, alas, she must still desire.
**Malay:**
73 Aku tidak percaya bahwa ibunya masih mencintaiku, 74 setelah dia mengganti kain lampin putih, 75 yang, sayang sekali, dia pasti masih menginginkannya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
76 Per lei assai di lieve si comprende 77 quanto in femmina foco d’amor dura, 78 se l’occhio o ’l tatto spesso non l’accende.
query.result:
**English:**
76 Through her it is easily understood 77 how long the fire of love lasts in a woman, 78 if the eye or touch does not often kindle it.
**Malay:**
76 Melalui dirinya sangat mudah untuk dipahami 77 betapa lama api cinta bertahan pada seorang wanita, 78 jika mata atau sentuhan tidak sering menyalakannya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
79 Non le farà sì bella sepultura 80 la vipera che Melanesi accampa, 81 com’ avria fatto il gallo di Gallura».
query.result:
**English:**
79 The viper that Melanese breeds will not make for her so beautiful a tomb, 80 as would have done the cock of Gallura.
**Malay:**
79 Ular berbisa yang dipelihara oleh orang-orang Melanesi tidak akan membuatkannya makam yang seindah itu, 80 seperti yang akan dilakukan oleh ayam jantan dari Gallura.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
82 Così dicea, segnato de la stampa, 83 nel suo aspetto, di quel dritto zelo 84 che misuratamente in core avvampa.
query.result:
**English:**
82 Thus he spoke, marked with the imprint, 83 in his appearance, of that righteous zeal 84 that burns with moderation in the heart.
**Malay:**
82 Demikian katanya, ditandai dengan cap, 83 dalam penampilannya, dari semangat yang benar itu 84 yang menyala dengan kesederhanaan di dalam hati.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
85 Li occhi miei ghiotti andavan pur al cielo, 86 pur là dove le stelle son più tarde, 87 sì come rota più presso a lo stelo.
query.result:
**English:**
85 My greedy eyes were always going to the sky, 86 even there where the stars are slowest, 87 like a wheel closer to the axle.
**Malay:**
85 Mataku yang rakus terus memandang ke langit, 86 bahkan di sana di mana bintang-bintang paling lambat, 87 seperti roda yang lebih dekat ke porosnya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
88 E ’l duca mio: «Figliuol, che là sù guarde?». 89 E io a lui: «A quelle tre facelle 90 di che ’l polo di qua tutto quanto arde».
query.result:
**English:**
88 And my guide: "My son, what are you looking at up there?". 89 And I to him: "At those three torches 90 with which the pole here is all aflame".
**Malay:**
88 Dan pemanduku: "Anakku, apa yang kau lihat di sana?". 89 Dan aku kepadanya: "Pada tiga obor itu 90 yang dengannya kutub di sini semuanya menyala".

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
91 Ond’ elli a me: «Le quattro chiare stelle 92 che vedevi staman, son di là basse, 93 e queste son salite ov’ eran quelle».
query.result:
**English:**
91 Then he said to me: "The four bright stars 92 that you saw this morning are down there, 93 and these have risen where those were."
**Malay:**
91 Kemudian dia berkata kepadaku: "Empat bintang terang 92 yang kaulihat tadi pagi, ada di sana di bawah, 93 dan bintang-bintang ini telah terbit di tempat bintang-bintang itu berada."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
94 Com’ ei parlava, e Sordello a sé il trasse 95 dicendo: «Vedi là ’l nostro avversaro»; 96 e drizzò il dito perché ’n là guardasse.
query.result:
**English:**
94 As he spoke, Sordello drew him aside, 95 saying: "See there our adversary"; 96 and he pointed his finger so that he would look there.
**Malay:**
94 Ketika ia berbicara, Sordello menariknya ke samping, 95 berkata: "Lihatlah di sana musuh kita"; 96 dan ia mengarahkan jarinya agar ia melihat ke sana.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
97 Da quella parte onde non ha riparo 98 la picciola vallea, era una biscia, 99 forse qual diede ad Eva il cibo amaro.
query.result:
**English:**
97 From that side where the little valley has no shelter, 98 there was a serpent, 99 perhaps the same one that gave Eve the bitter food.
**Malay:**
97 Dari sisi di mana lembah kecil itu tidak memiliki perlindungan, 98 ada seekor ular, 99 mungkin yang sama yang memberikan Hawa makanan pahit.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
100 Tra l’erba e ’ fior venìa la mala striscia, 101 volgendo ad ora ad or la testa, e ’l dosso 102 leccando come bestia che si liscia.
query.result:
**English:**
100 Among the grass and flowers came the evil serpent, 101 turning its head and back now and then, 102 licking itself like a beast that grooms itself.
**Malay:**
100 Di antara rumput dan bunga-bunga datanglah ular jahat itu, 101 memutar kepalanya dan punggungnya sesekali, 102 menjilati dirinya sendiri seperti binatang yang sedang membersihkan diri.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
103 Io non vidi, e però dicer non posso, 104 come mosser li astor celestïali; 105 ma vidi bene e l’uno e l’altro mosso.
query.result:
**English:**
103 I did not see, and therefore cannot say, 104 how the celestial falcons moved; 105 but I saw clearly both the one and the other in motion.
**Malay:**
103 Aku tidak melihat, dan karena itu tidak dapat mengatakan, 104 bagaimana elang-elang surgawi itu bergerak; 105 tetapi aku melihat dengan jelas keduanya bergerak.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
106 Sentendo fender l’aere a le verdi ali, 107 fuggì ’l serpente, e li angeli dier volta, 108 suso a le poste rivolando iguali.
query.result:
**English:**
106 Hearing the air being beaten by the green wings, 107 the serpent fled, and the angels turned, 108 flying back up to their posts in equal measure.
**Malay:**
106 Mendengar udara dipukul oleh sayap-sayap hijau, 107 ular itu melarikan diri, dan para malaikat berbalik, 108 terbang kembali ke pos mereka dengan ukuran yang sama.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
109 L’ombra che s’era al giudice raccolta 110 quando chiamò, per tutto quello assalto 111 punto non fu da me guardare sciolta.
query.result:
**English:**
109 The shade that had gathered before the judge 110 when he called out, during all that assault 111 was not let loose from my gaze for an instant.
**Malay:**
109 Bayangan yang telah berkumpul di hadapan hakim 110 ketika dia memanggil, selama serangan itu 111 tidak pernah lepas dari pandanganku.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
112 «Se la lucerna che ti mena in alto 113 truovi nel tuo arbitrio tanta cera 114 quant’ è mestiere infino al sommo smalto»,
115 cominciò ella, «se novella vera 116 di Val di Magra o di parte vicina 117 sai, dillo a me, che già grande là era.
query.result:
**English:**
112 "If the lamp that leads you on high 113 finds in your free will as much wax 114 as is needed to reach the highest enamel,"
115 she began, "if you know true news 116 of the Val di Magra or of a nearby region, 117 tell it to me, for I was once great there.
**Malay:**
112 "Jika lampu yang menuntunmu ke atas 113 menemukan dalam kehendak bebasmu lilin yang cukup 114 sebagaimana yang dibutuhkan hingga ke lapisan email tertinggi,"
115 dimulailah olehnya, "jika kamu tahu berita yang benar 116 dari Val di Magra atau daerah terdekat 117 katakanlah kepadaku, karena aku pernah berkuasa di sana.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
121 «Oh!», diss’ io lui, «per li vostri paesi 122 già mai non fui; ma dove si dimora 123 per tutta Europa ch’ei non sien palesi?
124 La fama che la vostra casa onora, 125 grida i segnori e grida la contrada, 126 sì che ne sa chi non vi fu ancora;
127 e io vi giuro, s’io di sopra vada, 128 che vostra gente onrata non si sfregia 129 del pregio de la borsa e de la spada.
query.result:
**English:**
121 "Oh!" I said to him, "through your lands 122 I have never been; but where does one dwell 123 throughout Europe that they are not known?
124 The fame that honors your house 125 proclaims the lords and proclaims the region, 126 so that even those who have not been there know of it;
127 and I swear to you, if I go above, 128 that your honored people do not disgrace themselves 129 with the value of the purse and the sword.
**Malay:**
121 "Oh!" kataku kepadanya, "melalui tanah kalian 122 aku belum pernah; tetapi di mana orang tinggal 123 di seluruh Eropa sehingga mereka tidak dikenal?
124 Ketenaran yang menghormati rumah kalian, 125 menyerukan para penguasa dan menyerukan wilayah itu, 126 sehingga bahkan mereka yang belum pernah ke sana pun tahu tentangnya;
127 dan aku bersumpah kepada kalian, jika aku pergi ke atas, 128 bahwa orang-orang kalian yang terhormat tidak mempermalukan diri mereka sendiri 129 dengan nilai uang dan pedang.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
130 Uso e natura sì la privilegia, 131 che, perché il capo reo il mondo torca, 132 sola va dritta e ’l mal cammin dispregia».
query.result:
**English:**
130 Custom and nature so privilege her, 131 that, though the chief be wicked and the world go astray, 132 she alone goes straight and scorns the evil way.
**Malay:**
130 Kebiasaan dan kodrat sangat mengistimewakannya, 131 sehingga, meskipun pemimpinnya jahat dan dunia tersesat, 132 hanya dialah yang berjalan lurus dan meremehkan jalan yang jahat.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
133 Ed elli: «Or va; che ’l sol non si ricorca 134 sette volte nel letto che ’l Montone 135 con tutti e quattro i piè cuopre e inforca,
136 che cotesta cortese oppinïone 137 ti fia chiavata in mezzo de la testa 138 con maggior chiovi che d’altrui sermone,
139 se corso di giudicio non s’arresta».
query.result:
**English:**
133 And he: "Now go; for the sun does not set 134 seven times in the bed that the Ram 135 covers and bestrides with all four feet,
136 that this courteous opinion 137 will be nailed into your head 138 with greater nails than another's sermon,
139 if the course of justice is not stopped."
**Malay:**
133 Dan dia: "Sekarang pergilah; karena matahari tidak terbenam 134 tujuh kali di tempat tidur yang si Domba Jantan 135 tutupi dan tunggangi dengan keempat kakinya,
136 bahwa pendapat yang sopan ini 137 akan dipaku di kepalamu 138 dengan paku yang lebih besar daripada khotbah orang lain,
139 jika jalannya pengadilan tidak dihentikan."
